summary: REQ-34 is partially implemented: the checkout URLs were updated in subscriptionLinks.ts to non-empty https links, but the diff does not show any changes ensuring the Subscribe button opens these links in a new tab or that click tracking still fires before navigation.

missing_requirements.requirement: When a visitor selects Monthly and clicks the Subscribe button, the site opens the configured Monthly checkout URL in a new tab.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows configuration changes in subscriptionLinks.ts and does not show any component/handler code that opens the URL in a new tab.

missing_requirements.requirement: When a visitor selects Annual and clicks the Subscribe button, the site opens the configured Annual checkout URL in a new tab.
missing_requirements.reason: No UI click-handler or anchor target changes are shown in the diff; only the URL config file was modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Click tracking continues to record clicks for 'subscription-monthly' and 'subscription-annual' before opening the outbound link.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include any click-tracking related code or evidence that tracking is preserved before navigation.

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-34, which is limited to configuring real checkout links and ensuring outbound navigation + tracking behavior.
Not requested by REQ-34 and unrelated to configuring subscription checkout links or click behavior.
